schema.description: Free and Libre Open Networks API X.X.X

___location.description: Position data such as a postal address or geographic coordinates
___location.title: Location

___lat.description: Latitude of your city in decimal degrees (e.g. 51.12345)
___lat.title: Latitude

___address.description: The address of the place you meet

___Zipcode.description: the zip code of your meeting place
___Zipcode.title: ZIP

___Name.description: the name of place you meet
___Name.title: Name of your place

___country.description: Your country, list taken from http://countrylist.net/de/
___country.title: Country

___city.description: name of your city or region
___city.title: City

___lon.description: Longitude of your city in decimal degrees (e.g. 11.6789)
___lon.title: Longitude

___state.description: A collection of status-related data. Actual open/closed status, icons, last change timestamp etc.

___lastchange.description: At what iso timestamp has your community status lastly changed? (ISO 8601 timestamp)
___lastchange.title: Last Change

___description.description: Describe your community in a few lines
___description.title: Description

___focus.description: What's the focus of your local community?
___focus.title: Focus

___message.description: A free-form string something like 'open for public', 'members only' or whatever you want it to be)
___message.title: Message

___nodes.description: number of active nodes. This field is predestined to be updated regularly, please see sample solutions for Gluon or OLSR
___nodes.title: Active Nodes

___internalUri.description: URI to use your service from freifunk or icvpn-networks
___internalUri.title: Internal URI

___externalUri.description: URI to use your service from the internet
___externalUri.title: External URI

___api.description: The Free and Libre Open Networks API version you use
___api.title: API

___nodeMaps.description: maps of nodes or topology your community provides

___interval.description: how often the map will be refreshed
___interval.title: interval

___mapType.description: the kind of data the map provides
___mapType.title: map type human readable

___url.description: the url where the map is located
___url.title: Url of the map

___technicalType.description: the kind of map is used
___technicalType.title: map technical type

___techDetails.description: technical details of your community's freifunk implementation

___dns.descripition: dns servers for domains used by your community
___dns.title: DNS Servers

___nameserver.description: Nameservers servings zones of your domain
___nameserver.title: Nameserver

___updatemode.description: how do you deploy firmware updates?
___updatemode.title: Updatemode

___routing.description: routing protocols used within your community
___routing.title: Routing protocols

___ipv4.description: ipv4 networks used by your community

___network.description: ipv4 network name (e.g. 10.w.x.y/z) in CIDR notation

___ipv6.description: ipv6 networks used by your community
___ipv6.title: IPv6 networks

___network.description: ipv6 network network (e.g.2620:0:2d0:200::7/32) in CIDR notation

___timeline.description: These are lifetime events something like date of birth (and rebirth :-) of your community or other important milestones

___timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event happened (format yyyy-mm-dd)
___timestamp.title: Timestamp

___url.description: url to details of this timeline-element
___url.title: URL

___webform.description: URL to your community's contact form (http{s}://...)
___webform.title: Webform

___email.description: Email address to which other people can contact your community (user@domain.com)
___email.title: Email

___facebook.description: URL to your community's facebook account (https://facebook.com/...)
___facebook.title: facebook

___googleplus.description: URL to your community's g+ account (https://plus.google.com/...)
___googleplus.title: Google+

___phone.description: if your community has a phone number (e.g. +49 1234 567890 based on E.123 notation)
___phone.title: Phone

___irc.description: your community's irc channel, starts with irc://
___irc.title: IRC

___ml.description: The email address (user@domain.com) of your mailing list or a link to the mailinglist info page (http{s}://...)
___ml.title: Mailinglist

___identica.description: URL to your community's identica account (https://identi.ca/...)
___identica.title: Identica

___type.description: type of the feed like rss, atom, xml
___type.title: Feed type

___category.description: category of the feed like blog entries, calendars, forum messages, wiki articles, ...
___category.title: Feed category
